sql.id: select userId, userCode, username, bmi_scope from t_user where true=true <<and userid=#id#>> <<and usercode=#code#>> <<and username like #name#>> {order by userid=#idSort#, usercode=#codeSort#, username=#nameSort#}

select userId, userCode, username from t_user where true=true <<and userid=#id#>> <<and usercode=#code#>> <<and username like #name#>> {order by userid=#idSort#, usercode=#codeSort#, username=#nameSort#}
